name: smite
description: Zero-debt engineering with unified development workflow. Features 3-plugin architecture (core, studio, essentials) with 4-flag composable system, semantic search with 75% token savings, and parallel execution (2-3x speedup).

metadata.description: SMITE v1.5.1 - Complete core infrastructure implementation + git workflow integration. Core (config, hooks, validation, platform, templates) + Studio (complete dev workflow) + Essentials (productivity + git integration).

plugins.name: core
plugins.description: Complete core infrastructure with ConfigManager (load, merge, validate), HookRegistry (plugin lifecycle), SchemaValidator (runtime validation), PlatformDetector (cross-platform), TemplateEngine (variable substitution), Logger (structured logging), ErrorHandler (standardized errors), and ManifestLoader (dependency management). All declared capabilities fully implemented.

plugins.name: studio
plugins.description: Complete development workflow - explore, architect, build, refactor. Unified command namespace with 4 exploration modes, architecture design with creative workflow, 4-flag implementation system (speed, scale, quality, team), and systematic refactoring. Merged from agents, implement, explore, refactor.

plugins.name: essentials
plugins.description: Productivity utilities - automatic session renaming, cross-platform shell aliases (cc, ccc), and lightweight git workflow integration. Smart session naming based on context with customizable triggers and filters. Git integration generates smart commands based on SMITE 4-flag system (conventional commits, branch management, changelog generation). Merged from shell, auto-rename, and git-integration.
